General.Name: Forbidden Spirits Distilling Corp
General.Description: Forbidden Spirits Distilling Corp. manufactures and distributes alcoholic spirits. The company offers its products under the REBEL Vodka, Eve's Original Gin, Adam's Apple Brandy, Forbidden Fire, Forbidden Spirits Vodka, and Wallace Hill Whisky brands. It also sells hand sanitizers and merchandise products. The company serves restaurants, pubs, hotels, and golf courses; and private beer, wine, and spirits stores. It sells its products through online and retail stores. Forbidden Spirits Distilling Corp. is headquartered in Kelowna, Canada.
General.Address: 4400 Wallace Hill Road, Kelowna, BC, Canada, V1W 4C3
